definition: اسر asara i (asr) to bind, fetter, shackle, chain (ه s.o.); to capture, take prisoner (ه s.o.); to captivate, fascinate, hold spellbound (ه s.o.), absorb, arrest (هـ the attention) X to surrender, give s.o. up as prisoner اسر asr (leather) strap, thong; capture; captivity│شدة الاسر šiddat al-a. vigor, energy
